title: Analysis Result
description: Per-agent result from a graph analysis llm-orc ensemble. Parsed by parse_analysis_response() in src/adapter/graph_analysis.rs.

updates.description: Property updates to apply to existing nodes.

node_id.description: Target node ID (must exist in the context).

properties.description: Key-value pairs to merge into the node's properties. Values may be numbers, strings, or booleans.
